name: John Mitchell
text: Really awesome staff. Great pizza. They have beer. Quiet environment. Way better than down in summit.

name: Matthew Grey
text: Need meth?? Just come through the drive through and the manager will have it right out. No ride or legs? No worries. Police will bring it to you shortly. AVOID THIS PLACE.

name: David Cohen
text: These guys were awesome! Great pizza, and service. They also let me put some stuff in their dumpster, they didn't need to do that.Very kind

name: Stephanie French
text: don't ever order from this place. They always shut down early and it's run by children and unprofessional baffoons. When I call to place my order this evening they informed me it's too slow and so they shut everything down already. When I â€¦More

name: Mike H
text: Well...it had pizza. We don't expect much from Pizza Hut and this one fits that expectation. The employees were nice and helpful but the place is dirty and run down. We won't go back.

name: Snoykster
text: My friends and I decided to stop for some grub after hiking a 14er.  I wasn't too excited on the idea of stopping at Pizza Hut but went along with the decision.  The restaurant doesn't have the best look to it (but it is in FairPlay â€¦More

name: Ross m
text: Disgusting and very unprofessional. Credit card machine is always broke,place is dirty and the staff all look like a bunch of crackheads.

name: Matt don
text: THIS PIZZA HUT IS PERMANENTLY CLOSED. IT WILL SOON BE A FAMILY ORIENTED RESTAURANT "THE HUNGRY MINER"

name: Shelly Lindemann
text: Fairplay Pizza Hut was great, sit down with salad bar old school. So much better than delivery ðŸšš Nice people

name: Jason Tinder
text:
Terrible!!!  If I could rate a -5 stars...I would.

We came into your establishment on July 2nd 2016. We walked in and were ignored. â€¦More

name: Ed U
text: They tried to steal money from us.  We went in to pick up our pizza and they said it was $4 more than it should have cost.  When I brought it to the woman's attention she stated that she always tells people that it's more.  She would not â€¦More

name: Dillon Johnson
text: I've been sitting here for 15 mins waiting on one order. There are too young kids working the whole thing and I still haven't even received my water. DONT GO HERE IF YOUR LOOKING FOR FAST FOOD

name: kevin scott
text: I live here. Every once in a while we will get descent pizza. But tonight's expirence has put me past the edge. They didn't give us the right buffalo wing's and there was no cheese on the pizza. Do not go to this place. It is a waste of money.

name: Ryan Archer
text: Party of 12 - all had the salad bar and we were in/out in 45 mins and  under $70!

name: Meatless Buffalo
text: Hopefully, Pizza Hut closes this place down. PERMANENTLY!

name: Ashlyn Kolenc
text: It was terrible. Ran by children and they started shutting it down early and denying dine-ins at 6:00 and it closes at 8:00 dissatisfied.
